ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“The rest is up to you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“Please take me with you.
You're going after
Sephiroth, aren't you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“I've lost a lot
because of Sephiroth too.
So please take me along.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
You're going after
Sephiroth, aren't you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“I've lost a lot
because of Sephiroth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Red XIII}
“I'm going to call everyone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cid}
“Man, I sure am thankful.
Wanna rest a while?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Yuffie}
“Are you saying
you don't like me?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cait Sith}
“I'll gather everybody,
so you go on ahead.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Vincent}
“Keep on your guard…
Sephiroth may be near.”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“Please take me with you.
You're going after
Sephiroth, aren't you?”

{Tifa}
“I've lost a lot
because of Sephiroth too.
So please take me along.”

{Tifa}
You're going after
Sephiroth, aren't you?”

{Tifa}
“I've lost a lot
because of Sephiroth.”

{Cid}
“Man, I sure am thankful.
Wanna rest a while?”

{Yuffie}
“Are you saying
you don't like me?”

{Cait Sith}
“I'll gather everybody,
so you go on ahead.”

{Vincent}
“Keep on your guard…
Sephiroth may be near.”
